text: The main warmachine of the household, altho starting to run outdated iron. Intel i7-9700k, cursed 24GB of DDR4 @3200MHz and MSI GTX 1070 GPU.

Trusty rustbucket from 2012s. Sports Intel i7-3770k, 16GB of DDR3 @1600Hz and 500GB 2,5" SSD. Mainly seen use as server machine, example, for modded Minecraft. Possibly looking into setting up some kind of external storage in future, if the iron holds.
